## Description {#details}

Represents a pseudo instruction which replaces a G&#95;SHUFFLE&#95;VECTOR.

Used for matching target-supported shuffles before codegen.

Definition at line 69 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64postlegalizerlowering-cpp">AArch64PostLegalizerLowering.cpp</a>.
